trans-unit.source: Represents controls that expose their dock properties within a docking container.
trans-unit.target: Representa os controles que expõem as propriedades de encaixe dentro de um contêiner de encaixe.

trans-unit.source: A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
trans-unit.target: Um contêiner de encaixe é um controle que permite que a organização de filho elementos, tanto horizontal quanto verticalmente, em relação aos limites do contêiner do encaixe e outros elementos dentro do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked relative to each other based on their current z-order; the higher their z-order placement, the further they are placed from the specified edge of the docking container.
trans-unit.target: Controles são encaixados em relação a outros com base em sua ordem-z atual; o mais alto sua ordem z colocação, quanto mais serem colocados da borda do contêiner de encaixe especificada.

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [mapeamento de padrão de controle para clientes de automação de interface do usuário](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) para obter exemplos de controles que podem implementar esse padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern> does not support any properties of the docking container or any properties of controls that might be docked adjacent to the current control within the docking container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern> não oferece suporte a qualquer propriedade do recipiente de encaixe ou propriedades de controles que podem ser encaixadas adjacente ao controle atual dentro do contêiner de encaixe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores de propriedade [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] armazenados em cache para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" />.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propriedade em cache devem ser anteriormente solicitados usando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A> para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade solicitada não está armazenada no cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores da propriedade [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] atual deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" />.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Esse padrão deve ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> referência para obter os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> foi obtida usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, ele contém somente dados armazenados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade gera uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A> para obter o valor armazenado em cache de uma propriedade que tenha sido especificado usando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation.DockPosition" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation.DockPosition" />.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente em <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.

trans-unit.source: This property can also be retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade também pode ser recuperada do <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition.None>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition.None>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition> value is obtained representing the current dock position for a control that supports <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern>.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition> valor é obtido representando a posição de encaixe atual para um controle que dá suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" /> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o padrão de controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" />.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente em <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.

trans-unit.source: The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] é passado para métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> para recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse especificado <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern> padrão de controle é obtido de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: The dock position relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
trans-unit.target: A posição de encaixe em relação aos limites do contêiner de encaixe e outros elementos dentro do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Docks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> at the requested <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition" /> within a docking container.
trans-unit.target: Encaixa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition" /> solicitado dentro de um contêiner de encaixe.

trans-unit.source: A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
trans-unit.target: Um contêiner de encaixe é um controle que permite que a organização de filho elementos, tanto horizontal quanto verticalmente, em relação aos limites do contêiner do encaixe e outros elementos dentro do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> representing a control that supports the DockPattern control pattern has its `dockPosition` modified.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que representa um controle que suporta o padrão de controle DockPattern tem seu `dockPosition` modificado.

trans-unit.source: When a control is not able to execute the requested dock style.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle não é capaz de executar o estilo de encaixe solicitado.
